Prospective Members

Thanks for your interest in our lab!

  • Georgia Tech Students

    • Current PhD Students: Please email Judy directly. Include your CV, relevant experience, semester interested in getting started, and funding requirements.
    • Current MS and BS Students: We do not currently have any open positions for Fall 2025. When positions are available we will include an application link here. Note, while prior research experience is not a requirement to join the lab, successful members will have prior experience through courses or projects in Computer Vision, Deep Learning, and Machine Learning.

  • Students Outside of Georgia Tech

    • Please apply directly to the College of Computing. Due to the volume of email I receive, I cannot reply to individual requests. I accept PhD students from both the CS PhD and the ML PhD programs.
    • My group is not accepting visitors from outside Georgia Tech at this time.
